title: I am no longer a member of my club and can not access other clubs
body:
Contacted rito over a few weeks now, with no response (not unexpected). I cannot join or look up other clans, which leads me to believe that I am still in mine, yet I cannot see it.

Plus, I have seen a lot of bots on ARAM recently. What's up with that?

replies.body:
You can be in up to 4 clubs at once, so I don't think you being in a a single club already is an issue.

Can you send me a screenshot of your clubs? Like [this](https://i.gyazo.com/51d9eea30d67c0e1924497c7bcafa411.png). And what happens when you enter a game, does a club tag show?

Also, over a week without a response is pretty long for a support ticket. If you give me a ticket ID I might be able to look into what went wrong for you.

I was expecting an email notification, hence the delay in response, so sorry about that.

Here is my brother's clubs screen: https://gyazo.com/a1152d63a370e550eb861b024b5d57d2

Here are my social things: https://gyazo.com/818aae2e6d70195b3ff7380896ccd6e2

Here is my clubs page: https://gyazo.com/4d9301b4101e67d10c9cdfac36cc91bb

Here is a loading screen image: https://gyazo.com/f5e26b113a99a7a23813b9f62ee96ef2

Also, I did not take note of the ticket ID, unfortunately.

Thanks for your time!
